## üöÄ Installation Instructions

### Option A: Manual Installation
1. Visit [awesome-copilot README](https://github.com/github/awesome-copilot/blob/main/docs/README.prompts.md)
2. Find each prompt in the recommended list
3. Click "Install in VS Code" badge
4. Confirm installation

### Option B: Copy Files Manually
1. Download prompt files from awesome-copilot repo
2. Place in `.github/prompts/` directory
3. Restart VS Code

### Option C: Use Discovery Prompt
Run `/suggest-awesome-github-copilot-prompts` (already installed!)
